metadata.title: CVE-2024-36616 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow in the component /libavformat/westwood_vqa.c of FFmpegn6.1.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service in the application viaa crafted VQA file.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
